title: Scene Parsing in Autonomous Vehicles
description: It is a prototype to show scene parsing in autonomous vehicles using image segmentation models such as YOLO, UNET, SAM, ResNet101 and SAM.

title: PortFolio Website
description: This is a portfolio website showcasing all the projects, certificates and contact links.

title: E-Learning and Library Management System
description: This is a project made for a college for library management and E-learning Portal for students.

title: Vision-The Virtual Assistant
description: This is an NLP-based chatbot that is configured with dynamic open-source APIs to perform a range of operations .

title: Food Nutrients Estimation using RCNN
description: This is a GUI Project that uses Region-Based CNN like Resnet101 and Mask-RCNN to estimate the nutrient of food in an input image.

title: Restaurant Management System
description: This is a project made to manage a restaurant business with user authentication, menu, customer orders and payments management.

title: Classroom Teaching App
description: This is an android app developed for a teaching firm to  facilitate classroom learning during Covid.

title: Hotel Management System
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.
